## Test for Tours, and tour classification

```{r test.tour, include=F}
# see if tours are not getting confused with trips.
nhts_trips %>% 
  filter(houseid %in% c(40794204, 40794233, 40794241)) %>%
  build_activities() %>%
  print(n = 45)


# look at 
nhts_trips %>% 
  select(houseid, personid, strttime, endtime, whyfrom, whyto) %>%
  filter(houseid == 40794233) %>% View()
```
